title: Huawei Watch_How can I pair my watch with another phone?
answer:
Your watch can only be paired with one phone. If you wish to pair your watch with another phone, you must restore your watch to the factory settings first.

Swipe left on the watch's home screen and then select **Settings** > **Factory reset** to restore your watch to the factory settings. Select **Pair with a new watch** in the Android Wear app and then follow the onscreen instructions to pair the watch with a new phone.
